citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) and the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS)
citeinfo.title: Topographic - Bathymetric Maps

descript.abstract: Data Type: Ocean/Coasts; These maps show both USGS land topography and NOS bathymetry (ocean bottom topography). These maps are cooperatively produced by NOS and USGS to support the Coastal Zone Management and Energy Impact Programs and the offshore oil and gas program. All 1:250,000 and 1:100,000 TOPO/BATHY maps are overprinted with the Minerals Management Service's OCS Protraction Diagram data.

idinfo.accconst: Available from National Ocean Service, 1:250,000 at $4.00 per paper copy.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metac: Available from National Ocean Service, 1:250,000 at $4.00 per paper copy.
